definition: to teach/to bequeath
to teach/to instruct/to award/to give
surname Ye
line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already

sentences.english: Most academics spend some of their time imparting knowledge as well.
sentences.chinese: 许多学者也会花时间传道授业。

sentences.english: Jens Lehmann is returning to Arsenal to pass on his eccentricity to the Gunners' next generation of stars.
sentences.chinese: 莱曼将回归阿森纳为下一代的枪手们传道授业解惑。

sentences.english: The teacher carry to preach the dual responsibility for teach.
sentences.chinese: 教师肩负着传道授业的双重责任。

sentences.english: Teacher, preach, teach, dispel doubt also.
Teacher, preach to teach to dispel doubt also.

to dispel doubts/to clear up confusion
when you teach someone, both teacher and student will benefit
